headline: 3 Reasons to Avoid ALGN and 1 Stock to Buy Instead
summary: Over the last six months, Align Technology’s shares have sunk to $170.94, producing a disappointing 14.2% loss - a stark contrast to the S&P 500’s 11.3% gain. This might have investors contemplating their next move.
